N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 576.4 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Commissioner
shall mean the Commissioner of Mental Health. (b) Medical assistance program shall mean the
program of medical assistance to needy persons authorized under title 11 of
article 5 of the Social Services Law and regulations promulgated thereunder and
title XIX of the Social Security Act, as identified in section
502.2
(c) of this

Title and regulations, as identified in section
502.2
(d) of this

Title, promulgated thereunder. (c) Patient day shall mean the unit of measure denoting lodging provided and
services rendered to one resident between the census-taking hour on two
successive days. A patient day is counted on the day of admission but not on
the day of discharge. A patient day is counted when a resident is admitted with
the expectation of remaining overnight but is discharged on the same day. A
patient day is counted on the day a resident returns from temporary
hospitalization or leave of absence for a therapy day, but not on the day a
resident departs. (d) Reserved bed
day shall mean the unit of measure between the census-taking hour on two
successive days during which a bed is reserved for a resident who is
temporarily hospitalized or is on leave of absence for a therapy day in
accordance with the provisions of section
576.6
of this Part. A reserved bed
day is counted on the day a resident departs for temporary hospitalization or
leave of absence for a therapy day but not on the day a resident returns. A
reserved bed day is counted on the day telephone notification is received of
circumstances requiring termination of the bed reservation but not on any
subsequent days. In no event may a reserved bed day be counted on a day for
which a patient day is counted. (e) Residential treatment facility shall mean an inpatient psychiatric facility
which provides active treatment under the direction of a physician for children
who are under 21 years of age and which is issued an operating certificate
pursuant to Part 584 of this Title. (f) A therapy day is a day when a resident is
not receiving residential treatment facility services on-site between the
census-taking hour on two successive days due to being away from the
residential treatment facility to spend time with family or friends in
accordance with the implementation of the resident's individual treatment
plan. Notes
